markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elemental Fist](/Feats.aspx?ID=441) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 160 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Ki Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=433)

</column>

---

You call upon the power of the elements, infusing your ki with elemental energy and allowing your attacks to deal energy damage. When you cast [_ki strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=486), in addition to the damage types normally available, you can deliver the extra damage in the form of a gust of storm-tossed wind (dealing electricity damage and gaining the air trait), a chunk of stone (dealing bludgeoning damage and gaining the earth trait), a flickering flame (dealing fire damage), or a crashing wave of frigid water (dealing cold damage and gaining the water trait).
name: Elemental Fist
